text: Akusikhona kwanoma yimuphi umphrofethi ukuthi angenza ukungathembeka futhi noma ngabe ngubani owenza ukungathembeki, uyoletha lokho angazange athembeke ngakho ngelanga lokuvuka kwabafileyo, ngakho-ke yonke imiphefumulo iyovuna izithelo zalokho ekutshalileyo, futhi bona angeke baphathwe ngendlela engafanele
